AUTH_SECRET.description: Auth.js/NextAuth v5 secret for session encryption

DEFAULT_ORG_ID.description: Default organization ID for multi-tenant setup

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Google OAuth client ID for authentication

GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Google OAuth client secret for authentication

MEILI_HOST.description: Meilisearch server URL for search indexing (e.g., http://localhost:7700 or https://meili.example.com)

MEILI_MASTER_KEY.description: Meilisearch master key for admin/indexing operations and authentication

HEALTH_CHECK_TOKEN.description: Token for health check endpoint authentication

JWT_SECRET.description: JWT signing secret for API authentication

OPENAI_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for PR Agent and AI features

SADAD_API_KEY.description: SADAD payout API key (optional; required when ENABLE_SADAD_PAYOUTS=true)

SADAD_API_SECRET.description: SADAD payout API secret (optional; required when ENABLE_SADAD_PAYOUTS=true)

SADAD_API_ENDPOINT.description: SADAD payout API endpoint (optional; required when ENABLE_SADAD_PAYOUTS=true)

RENOVATE_TOKEN.description: Token for Renovate bot to access repositories

SENTRY_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Sentry authentication token for sourcemap uploads

STORE_PATH.description: pnpm store path (set dynamically in workflow)

TEST_FINANCE_OFFICER_EMPLOYEE.description: E2E test finance officer employee ID

TEST_HR_OFFICER_EMPLOYEE.description: E2E test HR officer employee ID

TEST_OPERATIONS_MANAGER_EMPLOYEE.description: E2E test operations manager employee ID

TEST_SUPPORT_AGENT_EMPLOYEE.description: E2E test support agent employee ID

TEST_SUPPORT_AGENT_USER_ID.description: E2E test support agent user ID

TEST_TEAM_MEMBER_EMPLOYEE.description: E2E test team member employee ID

TEST_TEAM_MEMBER_USER_ID.description: E2E test team member user ID

ENABLE_PR_AGENT.description: Feature flag to enable PR Agent workflow (default true)

ENABLE_SADAD_PAYOUTS.description: Feature flag to enable SADAD/SPAN payouts (default false)

ENABLE_SENTRY.description: Feature flag to enable Sentry release and sourcemap uploads (default true)
